HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. It showcases products and provides navigation to different sections of the website.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo that navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners section.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier section.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the headphones section.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the lighting section.

elements.name: Support
elements.description: Link to the support section.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the best sellers section.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
Page contains the text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI'

DysonIndiaPage.description: This is the homepage of Dyson India. It showcases various Dyson products and provides navigation to different product categories and support resources.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product details page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners product category.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier product category.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the headphones product category.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the lighting product category.

elements.name: Support
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Header text contains 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'

DysonAirstraitStraightenerPage.description: This page is a product detail page for the Dyson Airstrait hair straightener in pink and gold. It provides information about the product and allows users to purchase it.

elements.name: Add to Cart Button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Buy Now Button
elements.description: Button to directly purchase the product.

elements.name: Product Title
elements.description: The main title of the product on the page.

elements.name: Product Image
elements.description: The main image of the Dyson Airstrait straightener.

assertions: Page contains the 'Add to cart' button

ProductsPage.description: This page displays an 'Access Denied' error, indicating that the user does not have permission to access the requested resource (adding a product to the cart).

elements.name: Access Denied Heading
elements.description: The main heading indicating access is denied.

elements.name: Error Description
elements.primary_locator: text=You don't have permission to access
elements.backup_locator: p:contains('You don\'t have permission to access')
elements.description: The paragraph explaining the access denial.

elements.name: Error URL
elements.description: Link to the error details page.

assertions: Verify that the 'Access Denied' heading is displayed
Verify that the error description is displayed
Verify that the error URL is displayed
